items.content_html: UI is a small and minimalistic UI framework without any dependencies. The framework doesn't care about browser support since it is meant to work only in evergreen browsers. It is meant to be lightweight and lightning fast without hundreds of components but only what's necessary.
items.title: leicht-io/ui: UI is a small and minimalistic UI framework without any dependencies. The framework doesn't care about browser support since it is meant to work only in evergreen browsers. It is meant to be lightweight and lightning fast without hundreds of components but only what's necessary.

items.content_html: MicroLib is a lightweight API framework built on Node.js that uses module federation to host and integrate multiple, independently deployable "microservice libraries" running in the same process, with a view toward eliminating or ameliorating the well-known tradeoff between deployment independence and operational complexity.
items.title: tysonrm/MicroLib: MicroLib is a lightweight API framework built on Node.js that uses module federation to host and integrate multiple, independently deployable "microservice libraries" running in the same process, with a view toward eliminating or ameliorating the well-known tradeoff between deployment independence and operational complexity.
